project.name: Firebrick UI API
project.description: Firebrick UI API: a component library for Firebrick MVC, Knockout JS, jQuery and Bootstrap

Firebrick.ui.name: Firebrick.ui
Firebrick.ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

components.button.ButtonGroupBase.name: components.button.ButtonGroupBase
components.button.ButtonGroupBase.description: do not extend from this but from Firebrick.ui.button.ButtonGroup

components.button.ButtonGroup.name: components.button.ButtonGroup
components.button.ButtonGroup.description: the items property does not need to have each object defined with its uiName, that is down automatically

components.common.Base.name: components.common.Base
components.common.Base.description: Super class for all components. Extends from Firebrick.view.Base

components.common.MultiplesBase.name: components.common.MultiplesBase
components.common.MultiplesBase.description: Base for inputs where multiple options are possible: checkboxes, radio and togglesbuttons for example

components.fields.Display.name: components.fields.Display
components.fields.Display.description: read only input field but doesn't look like an input field

ui.name: ui
ui.description: Firebrick component library for Firebrick JS MVC

classitems.description:
when property columnWidth is set to "auto", this function will attempt to calculate the correct size for each column.
Note: this function will round down to the nearest whole number - 5 columns will result in size 2 for each column
the number of columns are divided by 12 (BS3 grid)
